entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a person who is being ushered out of the Hog's Head by her friend. She waves at Harry as she leaves.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is walking out of the Hog's Head with Ron and Hermione. Cho waves at him as she leaves.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is walking out of the Hog's Head with Harry and Ron. She mentions that Zacharias overheard her talking to Ernie and Hanna.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is walking out of the Hog's Head with Harry and Hermione. He glowers at Smith in the distance.

entities.name: smith
entities.description: Smith is a person who is standing in the distance and being glared at by Ron.

entities.name: zacharias
entities.description: Zacharias is a person who overheard Hermione talking to Ernie and Hanna. He seems interested in coming to the event.

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is a person who was talked to by Hermione at the Hufflepuff table.

entities.name: hanna
entities.description: Hanna is a person who was talked to by Hermione at the Hufflepuff table.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: Michael Corner is a person who would not have come to the event if he wasn't going out with Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who Michael Corner is going out with. Her presence at the event seems to be a factor in whether or not other people attend.

entities.name: hog's head
entities.description: The Hog's Head is a location where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are walking out of.

relationships.description: Hermione mentions that Zacharias overheard her talking to Ernie and Hanna and seemed really interested in coming to the event.
Ron glowers at Smith in the distance, indicating that he does not like him.
Cho waves at Harry as she leaves the Hog's Head.
Hermione mentions that Zacharias overheard her talking to Ernie and Hanna.
Hermione mentions that Zacharias overheard her talking to Ernie and Hanna.
